title: Mid-Term Intensive Training Course for Improving Language Switching and Inhibitory Control Abilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Targeting current professionals, emphasizing enhancement of language-switching skills applicable to work tasks

learning_goals: Learners can reduce response time by 20% when switching between a new language (Lnew) and their native language (L1)
Learners can decrease errors by 35% using inhibitory control strategies in language interference situations
Learners can explain cognitive load changes during language switching through late positive component (LPC) pattern analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
